name: Absorb Vis
oracle_text:
Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.
Basic landcycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Armillary Sphere
oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Armillary Sphere: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The mysterious purpose of two of the rings had eluded Esper mages—until now.

name: Asha's Favor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying, first strike, and vigilance.
flavor_text: As his new wings lifted him high above Bant, Taric felt his earthly aspirations transform into heavenly resolve.

name: Aven Squire
oracle_text:
Flying
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: When the meek charge into battle, courage becomes infectious.

name: Aven Trailblazer
oracle_text:
Flying
Domain — Aven Trailblazer's toughness is equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control.
flavor_text:
"The bird wore the form of a man, bereft of filigree. Why do the Texts not speak of it?"
—Belator of Esper

name: Beacon Behemoth
oracle_text: {1}: Target creature with power 5 or greater gains vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text: When its smoky plumes light Naya's sky, every creature from the smallest pip fawn to the largest rannet heeds the warning.

name: Bone Saw
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: In a world where death is always violent, cruel weapons are as common as rocks.

name: Brackwater Elemental
oracle_text:
When Brackwater Elemental attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
Unearth {2}{U} ({2}{U}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Canyon Minotaur
flavor_text: On Jund, the deep canyons were the best places to hide. When the goblins wandered into Naya, they found that was not so true.

name: Constricting Tendrils
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: Priests of Bant protect their temples with traps more elaborate than any mosaic floor.

name: Court Homunculus
oracle_text: Court Homunculus gets +1/+1 as long as you control another artifact.
flavor_text: Mages of Esper measure their wealth and status by the number of servants in their retinues.

name: Darklit Gargoyle
oracle_text:
Flying
{B}: Darklit Gargoyle gets +2/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: It shines in the darkness of its master's ambitions.

name: Dark Temper
oracle_text: Dark Temper deals 2 damage to target creature. If you control a black permanent, destroy the creature instead.
flavor_text: When you've got the temperament of a dragon, every argument is one you'll win.

name: Drag Down
oracle_text: Domain — Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
flavor_text: The barbarians of Jund believe the bottomless tar pits extend forever into other, darker worlds.

name: Ember Weaver
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
As long as you control a red permanent, Ember Weaver gets +1/+0 and has first strike.
flavor_text:
"Each night, the sun unravels and blows away. Each day, the spiders set a new one in the sky."
—Sunseeder myth

name: Esper Cormorants
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"The smiths of this land must be mad to reach so far and so high for another creature to decorate."
—Cagen Vargan, Jhessian sea scout

name: Exploding Borders
oracle_text: Domain — Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Exploding Borders deals X damage to target player or planeswalker, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.
flavor_text: Reuniting a world is not a gentle process.

name: Faerie Mechanist
oracle_text:
Flying
When Faerie Mechanist enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Fiery Fall
oracle_text:
Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature.
Basic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
flavor_text: Jund feasts on the unprepared.

name: Frontline Sage
oracle_text:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: The battle was won in the commander's head before the first weapon was drawn.

name: Gleam of Resistance
oracle_text:
Creatures you control get +1/+2 until end of turn. Untap those creatures.
Basic landcycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Goblin Outlander
oracle_text: Protection from white
flavor_text: Egbol stared in wonder at Naya's landscape. So much to eat. So much to steal.

name: Grixis Illusionist
oracle_text: {T}: Target land you control becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
flavor_text: "It's simple, really. If they can't find us, they can't kill us."

name: Infectious Horror
oracle_text: Whenever Infectious Horror attacks, each opponent loses 2 life.
flavor_text: Not once in the history of Grixis has anyone died of old age.

name: Kaleidostone
oracle_text:
When Kaleidostone enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{5}, {T}, Sacrifice Kaleidostone: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}.
flavor_text: Once broken, who knows what worlds might grow from its shards?

name: Kranioceros
oracle_text: {1}{W}: Kranioceros gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"A surly beast, the kranioceros will raise its defenses at the smallest threat. Stay out of sight and downwind, or you'll disrupt its natural migrations."
—Ebrel, godtoucher mentor

name: Lapse of Certainty
oracle_text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
flavor_text: Without a connection of mind and body, magic is just an idea stuck in the head, a word on the tip of a tongue.

name: Mana Cylix
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: Those who dismiss the cylix as an ordinary wooden bowl are blind to the true measure of its worth.

name: Maniacal Rage
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
flavor_text: The spikes of sangrite made the goblin stronger, but they didn't make him any smarter.

name: Matca Rioters
oracle_text: Domain — Matca Rioters's power and toughness are each equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control.
flavor_text: When outsiders interrupted the matca championship, things got ugly.

name: Might of Alara
oracle_text: Domain — Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
flavor_text: The combined strength of all five planes spawned creations none had seen before.

name: Molten Frame
oracle_text:
Destroy target artifact creature.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: The metal filigree in his body glowed red-hot, and his flesh soon followed.

name: Nacatl Outlander
oracle_text: Protection from blue
flavor_text: Survival in the wilds of Naya left Tiyan well equipped to win the civilized battles of Bant.

name: Nacatl Savage
oracle_text: Protection from artifacts
flavor_text:
"Blades dull and armor dents. Marisi taught us that instinct is the only thing a true warrior needs."
—Ajani

name: Parasitic Strix
oracle_text:
Flying
When Parasitic Strix enters the battlefield, if you control a black permanent, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: After finding no sustenance on the edges of Grixis, it turned to the skies of Bant.

name: Pestilent Kathari
oracle_text:
Flying
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
{2}{R}: Pestilent Kathari gains first strike until end of turn.

name: Quenchable Fire
oracle_text: Quenchable Fire deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. It deals an additional 3 damage to that player or planeswalker at the beginning of your next upkeep step unless that player or that planeswalker's controller pays {U} before that step.
flavor_text: You'd better know how to pray for rain.

name: Rhox Bodyguard
oracle_text:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
When Rhox Bodyguard enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: An enlightened soul caged in a body made for battle.

name: Rhox Meditant
oracle_text: When Rhox Meditant enters the battlefield, if you control a green permanent, draw a card.
flavor_text: The weight of her conviction balances on the harmony of her soul.

name: Rotting Rats
oracle_text:
When Rotting Rats enters the battlefield, each player discards a card.
Unearth {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Rupture Spire
oracle_text:
Rupture Spire enters the battlefield tapped.
When Rupture Spire enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Salvage Slasher
oracle_text: Salvage Slasher gets +1/+0 for each artifact card in your graveyard.
flavor_text: Esper artificers never imagined that one day their scraps would be pressed against their soft and fragile throats.

name: Scattershot Archer
oracle_text: {T}: Scattershot Archer deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.
flavor_text: To train her elves for war, Mayael would drop a sackful of acorns from the tree canopy. Each archer tried to split as many as possible before the acorns hit the forest floor below.

name: Sedraxis Alchemist
oracle_text: When Sedraxis Alchemist enters the battlefield, if you control a blue permanent, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: The problem with a liquid that can dissolve anything is finding something to carry it in.

name: Suicidal Charge
oracle_text: Sacrifice Suicidal Charge: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn. Those creatures attack this turn if able.
flavor_text:
"They think they're winning. But they're just lining up to be dinner."
—Rakka Mar

name: Sylvan Bounty
oracle_text:
Target player gains 8 life.
Basic landcycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
flavor_text: Some who scouted new lands chose to stay.

name: Toxic Iguanar
oracle_text: Toxic Iguanar has deathtouch as long as you control a green permanent. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: There are no "weak" creatures on Jund. Even the smallest can strike a deadly blow.

name: Traumatic Visions
oracle_text:
Counter target spell.
Basic landcycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Tukatongue Thallid
oracle_text: When Tukatongue Thallid dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor_text: Jund's thallids tried to disguise their deliciousness by covering themselves in spines harvested from the tukatongue tree.

name: Unsummon
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Send it back to its own strange world so we can avoid another inglorious combat with these wicked beings."
—Captain Valek of Jhess

name: Valeron Outlander
oracle_text: Protection from black
flavor_text: After years of honing her philosophy in debate with stubborn rhoxes, Niella was ready to convert any heathen.

name: Valiant Guard
flavor_text: As the outsiders invaded Bant, soldiers who once saw sigils as the highest marks of glory began to see the scars of battle as tokens of equal worth.

name: Vectis Agents
oracle_text: {U}{B}: Vectis Agents gets -2/-0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: With their life energy suppressed under their etherium enhancements, thieves from Esper found it surprisingly easy to explore the ruins of Grixis.

name: Vedalken Outlander
oracle_text: Protection from red
flavor_text: The Seekers of Carmot searched across the unknown lands for the mystical red stone that could reforge Esper in ethereal perfection.

name: Wandering Goblins
oracle_text: Domain — {3}: Wandering Goblins gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
flavor_text: Tired of waiting for a dragon to eat them, some hardy goblins struck out to become meals for the unknown.

name: Wild Leotau
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Wild Leotau unless you pay {G}.
flavor_text:
"Leotau that were born wild make the best mounts. It's like riding a thunderstorm."
—Rafiq of the Many

name: Worldly Counsel
oracle_text: Domain — Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text: Every horizon hides a new possibility.

name: Wretched Banquet
oracle_text: Destroy target creature if it has the least power or is tied for least power among creatures on the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"The meek inherit nothing."
—Sedris, the Traitor King

name: Yoke of the Damned
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When a creature dies, destroy enchanted creature.
flavor_text: The demon's yoke is part leash, part noose.

name: Zombie Outlander
oracle_text: Protection from green
flavor_text: The ripe smell of life drifted into Grixis. The dead caught the scent and with reckless hunger followed it back into Jund.
